UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_BROADCAST_STORM_PROBLEM: Broadcast Packet exceed Rate which configured by Storm Control
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_BROADCAST_STORM_SOLUTIO: Abnormal behavior, please check the traffic from connected device.
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_MULTICAST_STORM_PROBLEM: Multicast Packet exceed Rate which configured by Storm Control
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_MULTICAST_STORM_SOLUTIO: Abnormal behavior, please check the traffic from connected device.
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_UNICAST_STORM_PROBLEM: Unicast Packet exceed Rate which configured by Storm Control
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_UNICAST_STORM_SOLUTION: Abnormal behavior, please check the traffic from connected device.
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_BDPU_STORM_PROBLEM: STP BPDU Packets exceed rate 15 pps (packet per seconds) per port
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_BDPU_STORM_SOLUTION: Abnormal behavior, please check the traffic from connected device.
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_ARP_INSPECTION_PROBLEM: ARP Packets exceed rate 300 pps (packet per seconds) per port
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_ARP_INSPECTION_SOLUTION: Abnormal behavior, please check the traffic from connected device.
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_DHCP_RATE_LIMIT_PROBLEM: DHCP Packets exceed rate 300 pps (packet per seconds) per port
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_DHCP_RATE_LIMIT_SOLUTIO: Abnormal behavior, please check the traffic from connected device.
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_ROGUE_DHCP_SERVER_PROBL: Rogue DHCP server detect on the port
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_ROGUE_DHCP_SERVER_SOLUT: Remove or shutdown the rogue DHCP server.
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_DOS_PROBLEM: Denial of Service attack (detail in the appendix.)
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_DOS_SOLUTION: Abnormal behavior, please check the traffic from connected device
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_PHY_FAILURE_PROBLEM: Port cannot linkup due to PHY failure
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_POE_FAILURE_PROBLEM: PoE port cannot delivery power due to PoE Failure
UBNT_SWITCH_PORT_POE_FAILURE_SOLUTION: The PoE of this port no longer available.
